languages.text: {n}Смерть застала этого мужчину внезапно и сковала его тело судорогой, не давшей телу упасть. Подобное действие оказывают некоторые редкие яды. При их воздействии человек не способен двинуться или позвать на помощь, пока он медленно задыхается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Смерть застала этого мужчину во время священной молитвы Императору и навсегда увековечила его последние секунды в этом сакральном действе. Вам известно о группе редких ядов — они повреждают нервную систему, мгновенно вызывая спазмы во всем теле и парализуя жертву. При их воздействии человек не может двигаться и даже дышать, медленно погибая от удушья.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Смерть застала этого мужчину внезапно и сковала его тело судорогой, не давшей телу упасть. Подобное действие оказывают некоторые редкие яды. При их воздействии человек не способен двинуться или позвать на помощь, пока он медленно задыхается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The death found him suddenly and confined his body with convulsions. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

{n}The death found him suddenly and confined his body with convulsions. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

{n}Death found him suddenly and ravaged his body with convulsions preventing him from falling on the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

{n}Death found him suddenly and ravaged his body with convulsions preventing him from falling on the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

{n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

{n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然の死が彼を襲い、床に倒れることもできないほどのけいれんで痛めつけた。珍しい毒物にはそういった副作用を持つものがある。毒におかされた犠牲者は動くことも助けを呼ぶこともできずにゆっくりと呼吸が止まる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然の死が彼を襲い、床に倒れることもできないほどのけいれんで痛めつけた。珍しい毒物にはそういった副作用を持つものがある。毒におかされた犠牲者は動くことも助けを呼ぶこともできずにゆっくりと呼吸が止まる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}死神骤然降临，他浑身肌肉抽搐，甚至无法倒在地上。某些罕见的毒药会有产生这样的效果，中毒者既无法移动，也无法呼救，只能在漫长的痛苦中窒息而死。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}死神骤然降临，他浑身肌肉抽搐，甚至无法倒在地上。某些罕见的毒药会有产生这样的效果，中毒者既无法移动，也无法呼救，只能在漫长的痛苦中窒息而死。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mort est venue soudainement. Il a été pris de spasmes si violents que son corps est resté figé dans cette position, incapable de suffisamment se relâcher pour s'écrouler comme il l'aurait dû. Certains poisons rares ont cet effet. Les victimes suffoquent lentement et finissent par mourir d'asphyxie sans pouvoir ne serait-ce qu'appeler à l'aide.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mort est venue soudainement. Il a été pris de spasmes si violents que son corps est resté figé dans cette position, incapable de suffisamment se relâcher pour s'écrouler comme il l'aurait dû. Certains poisons rares ont cet effet. Les victimes suffoquent lentement et finissent par mourir d'asphyxie sans pouvoir ne serait-ce qu'appeler à l'aide.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La muerte lo encontró repentinamente y asoló su cuerpo con fuertes convulsiones que le impidieron caer al suelo. Algunos venenos tienen esos efectos secundarios. La víctima se asfixia lentamente sin ser capaz de moverse ni de pedir ayuda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La muerte lo encontró repentinamente y asoló su cuerpo con convulsiones impidiéndole caer al suelo. Algunos venenos tienen esos efectos secundarios. La víctima se asfixia lentamente sin ser capaz de moverse ni de pedir ayuda.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Tod hat ihn plötzlich gefunden und krampfartige Zuckungen durch seinen Körper gejagt, die verhindert haben, dass er zu Boden fällt. Einige seltene Gifte haben solche Nebenwirkungen. Das Opfer erstickt langsam, ohne sich bewegen oder um Hilfe rufen zu können.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Tod hat ihn plötzlich gefunden und Zuckungen durch seinen Körper gejagt, die verhindert haben, dass er zu Boden fällt. Einige seltene Gifte haben solche Nebenwirkungen. Das Opfer erstickt langsam, ohne sich bewegen oder um Hilfe rufen zu können.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ecel, bu adamı çabuk bulmuş. Kasıntılı felçler, vücudunu sarıp yere düşmesini engellemiş. Bazı ender zehirlerin bu çeşit yan etkileri vardır. Zehri alan kişi hareket edemeden, yardım çağıramadan yavaşça boğulur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Death came for him suddenly and ravaged his body with cramping spasms that prevented him from falling to the ground. Some rare poisons have such side effects. The affected victim suffocates slowly without being able to move or call for help.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ecel bu adamı çabuk bulmuş. Kasıntılı felçler vücudunu sarmış ve yere düşmesini engellemiş. Bazı ender zehirlerin bu çeşit yan etkileri vardır. Zehri alan kişi hareket edemeden ve yardım çağıramadan yavaşça boğulur.{/n}
